title: Cave Curling Chaos
description: Slide prehistoric stones toward the target, then zap them with growth rays! Grow your stones bigger for better scores while shrinking your opponents' stones.
controls: Left stick to aim throw direction, A button to throw stone, B button to activate growth ray (grows your stones, shrinks opponents within range)
howToPlay: Each player gets 2 stone throws. Aim with the stick and press A to launch. After throwing, press B to activate your growth ray - it makes your stones bigger and enemy stones smaller! Closest stone to the center target wins. Rings score: Green=100pts, Yellow=50pts, Red=25pts. 3 minute rounds.
